meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of crustaceans.
meanings.sent1: The crustaceous creature had many legs and a tough shell.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the crustaceous features of the crab.
meanings.sent3: The crustaceous crab decided to throw a shell party.
meanings.sent4: Her stubbornness was as crustaceous as a lobster's shell.
meanings.sent5: The ocean floor was teeming with colorful and crustaceous creatures.

meanings.definition: Having a hard outer shell or covering.
meanings.sent1: The crustaceous armor protected the beetle from harm.
meanings.sent2: The turtle's crustaceous shell was beautifully patterned.
meanings.sent3: The crustaceous shield was so tough, even the hammer couldn't break it.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt crustaceous, guarded against any emotional attack.
meanings.sent5: The knight wore a crustaceous helmet into battle.

meanings.definition: Resembling or having qualities of a crustacean.
meanings.sent1: The crustaceous toy crab moved sideways just like a real one.
meanings.sent2: Her movements were as crustaceous as a lobster's.
meanings.sent3: The crustaceous dance routine made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His jokes had a crustaceous humor that always cracked us up.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting captured the essence of a crustaceous creature.
